comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Grace Emily Blundell Maple Weigall, formerly the Baroness von Eckardstein; her second husband Archibald Weigall (1874-1952) became Governor of South Australia in 1920: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archibald_Weigall

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to books.google.com/books?id=-CcwAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA55&lp... she was born on March 7, 1876. She inherited a fortune in 1903 from her father, who had expanded his father's furniture shop into a large-scale business. Maples went bankrupt in 1997. She and Weigall were married on August 16, 1910. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sir_John_Blundell_Maple,_1st_Baronet, her father's wikipedia page. At top left of both photos, this and www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4526082384/ of him a date of 3/19/25 is written.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and swang:  Thank you for the additional information on Grace Weigall. We will add some of it to the description.
